markdown:
| icon           = poe2 coral_snuff_icon.png
| description    = Native corals, crushed into a fine powder, mixed with gunpowder. Inhaled through the nose, this potent narcotic produces an intense surge of focus and euphoria, followed by crushing lethargy, often accompanied by nosebleeds and fatigue. These drawbacks have not reduced its popularity with the peoples of the Deadfire.
